## üöë About ChapterFlash‚Ñ¢ EMT

ChapterFlash‚Ñ¢ EMT is part of the **ProMedixEMS‚Ñ¢** learning ecosystem.

It was created by Emergency Medical Technician and software designer **Shaun Williamson** to solve one problem:

> *Most EMT flashcard apps are outdated, shallow, and not aligned to how EMS students actually learn.*

ChapterFlash‚Ñ¢ EMT delivers clean, structured, level-appropriate content built for today's EMS programs and national educational standards (original or fair-use material based on publicly available information).

**Not affiliated with NREMT, AAOS, or any textbook publisher.**  
**Not a replacement for accredited EMS education‚Äîdesigned to enhance it.**

## üõ† Tech Stack

- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with ProMedixEMS‚Ñ¢ design system
- **Database**: Prisma with SQLite
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **Algorithm**: Spaced Repetition Engine (SM-2 inspired)
- **Storage**: Local storage / offline mode
- **Content**: Config-driven content layer
- **Deployment**: Vercel-ready with optional App Store / Google Play build pipeline

---

## üöÄ Getting Started

### Prerequisites
- Node.js 18+ 
- npm or yarn

### Installation

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/your-username/ChapterFlash.git

# Navigate to the project directory
cd ChapterFlash

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Set up the database
npm run db:generate
npm run db:migrate
npm run db:seed

# Start the development server
npm run dev
```

Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) to view ChapterFlash‚Ñ¢ EMT in your browser.

## üìä Database Content

The application comes pre-loaded with:
- **675 Active Flashcards** across all EMT-B domains
- **48 Categories** for organized study
- **45 Chapters** mapping to standard EMT textbook structure
- **Balanced difficulty distribution** (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
- **5 Question types** (Definition, Recognition, Application, Scenario, Assessment)

## üéØ Key Features

### Study Modes
- **Quick Drill**: Fast-paced review sessions (10-20 cards)
- **Deep Session**: Comprehensive study with spaced repetition
- **Exam Mimic**: Simulated testing environment with performance tracking

### Smart Learning
- **Adaptive Algorithm**: Cards appear based on your performance
- **Difficulty Tracking**: Each card adjusts to your mastery level
- **Weak Area Targeting**: Focus on topics that need improvement
- **Progress Analytics**: Track your learning journey with detailed metrics

### Professional Design
- **ProMedixEMS‚Ñ¢ Glass Design**: Modern, medical-grade interface
- **3D Card Animations**: Smooth, engaging flip transitions
- **Responsive Layout**: Perfect on desktop, tablet, and mobile
- **Offline Support**: Study anywhere without internet connection

## üõ°Ô∏è Legal & Safety

‚ö†Ô∏è **IMPORTANT MEDICAL DISCLAIMER**

ChapterFlash‚Ñ¢ EMT is an educational tool designed to supplement formal EMS training. It is **NOT a substitute for**:
- Accredited EMT education programs
- Clinical training and hands-on experience
- Official certification courses
- Medical advice or patient care decisions

Always follow your local protocols, medical direction, and scope of practice. When in doubt, consult with qualified medical professionals or your medical director.
